content: get ready for the easiest most beautiful fast and fun hat ever what a crowd pleaser a great classic style that is a joy to crochet this listing is for a downloadable pdf of a crochet pattern only you will not receive a physical product skill level beginner > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern materials needed * super bulky weight #6 yarn * crochet hook sizes us n/p 10 mm and m/n 9mm crochet hook * tapestry needle size the finished measures 6 wide by 58 long note that scarf is rectangle in shape pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-scarf/
